name: Optickle
tagline: MATLAB based, frequency domain, quantum-opto-mechanics simulation of optical interferometers
body:
Optickle is a MATLAB based tool for frequency domain simulations of optical interferometers.

## Download
A .zip of the latest version can be downloaded [here.](https://github.com/Optickle/Optickle/archive/master.zip)

## Resourses
### Documentation
[User's Manual](https://github.com/nicolassmith/Optickle/blob/master/Docs/Optickle.pdf?raw=true) - Look in the `Docs/` directory for other documents.
### Example scripts 
In progress...
### Users Group
If you have any questions, you may send a message to the [Optickle Users Group](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/optickle-users). Many of the users are very familiar with Optickle and will be willing to help you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
